name: Dark-Ingress
short_description:
Dark-Ingress is an open source and portable device to enable you to safely utilize the Tor network, to obfuscate your location and anonymize of all your traffic automatically. While also giving you the ability to access to the Dark Net and .onion addresses

The Dark-Ingress uses the Raspberry PI as it's hardware platform. The software image file is intended to run on a Raspberry PI.

Bypass censorship and dragnet spying by governments! 
Utilize the Dark Net! 
...with the Dark-Ingress.

www.Dark-Ingress.com


www.Dark-Ingress.com
summary: Software image to create a physical & portable Tor transparent proxy.
